thread.title: Ronda Rousey is red hot in sexy swimwear for SELF Magazine - Swim Daily
thread.title_full: Ronda Rousey is red hot in sexy swimwear for SELF Magazine - Swim Daily - SI.com

author: Kelsey Hendrix
title: Ronda Rousey is red hot in sexy swimwear for SELF Magazine - Swim Daily
text:
by Kelsey Hendrix Posted: Thu Oct. 22, 2015 UNDEFEATED. It's no surprise that a word so synonymous with one of the greatest fighters of all time would appear next to an image of Ronda Rousey as she graces the cover of SELF Magazine's November issue.
Just a month after becoming the first woman to ever be featured on the front of Men's Fitness Australia, Ronda can now be found rocking a variety of ultra-sexy swimsuits and fierce poses for the publication which celebrates health, wellness and exercise each month. And in case you'd somehow forgotten just how badass Ronda's judo moves are, the magazine also showcases some of her best moves in stills.
Photo: SELF Magazine/Jason Kibbler Ronda was recently rated the best fighter, pound for pound—which should come as no surprise when she defeats opponents in mere seconds. And as she dishes on some of her pre and post fight rituals, you can bet we're all ears. • NEW: Week 7 $2M fantasy league. First place wins $150K and top 90K teams win cash! Sponsored by FanDuel
To learn more about Ronda's obsession with hot wings, her former Frappuccino-fighting days, and feelings on being the best in her sport, be sure to read the full interview online now . BONUS: See some of Ronda's best moments from SI Swimsuit 2015!
